Our ACO is Richard Burton. He can be reached at the Sheriffâs non-emergency PhoneÂ (207)-753-2500. Leave your name and number with them and Rich will return your call.

Sand is available at the Transfer Station during hours of operation. When Transfer Station is closed you may get it at the town garage. One five-gallon bucket per storm only.
